content:
fitzgen commented on issue #3587:

I wonder if we're also going to have an issue with using the isle crate name (in Cargo.toml here) rather than cranelift-isle, since (as you discovered) it's reserved right now? Should we update that in this PR as well?

I don't think this is an issue, as we had peepmatic and not cranelift-peepmatic and everything worked.

cfallin commented on issue #3587:

I wonder if we're also going to have an issue with using the isle crate name (in Cargo.toml here) rather than cranelift-isle, since (as you discovered) it's reserved right now? Should we update that in this PR as well?

I don't think this is an issue, as we had peepmatic and not cranelift-peepmatic and everything worked.

Is the crate not published, then? I guess I don't fully understand exactly how we determine which crates are published; if dev-dependencies don't go to crates.io then indeed, everything should just work, and nevermind me!

fitzgen commented on issue #3587:

Ah no, this is me failing my reading comprehension. The isle crate name is already taken on crates.io, and this is what I was failing to understand.

fitzgen commented on issue #3587:

So yeah, I think cranelift-isle is the way to go.

fitzgen commented on issue #3587:

The rename to cranelift-isle is done now.
